mapper.select: SELECT USERID AS USERID, USER_NICNAME AS USER_NICNAME, USER_EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(MY_PROFILE_IMG_URL,'/img/ProfileImg/default_img.png') AS PROFILE_IMG FROM CHATUSER WHERE USERID = #{userid} AND PASSWORD = #{password}

SELECT ROOMID, LASTTIME, LASTCONTENTS, USERINROOM,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT F WHERE F.ROOMID = E.ROOMID AND (SELECT LASTREADDATE FROM CHKREADMSG WHERE ROOMID = E.ROOMID AND USERID = #{userid}) < REG_DATE AND F.USERID != #{userid}) AS BADGE,
(SELECT MY_PROFILE_IMG_URL FROM CHATUSER WHERE USERID = (SELECT USERID FROM USERROOM WHERE ROOMID = E.ROOMID AND USERID != #{userid} AND ROWNUM = 1)) AS PROFILE_IMG FROM (SELECT A.ROOMID, CASE GREATEST(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yymmdd'),'yymmdd') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((SELECT MAX(REG_DATE) FROM CHAT B WHERE B.ROOMID = A.ROOMID),'yymmdd'),'yymmdd'),0) WHEN 0 THEN TO_CHAR((SELECT MAX(REG_DATE) FROM CHAT B WHERE B.ROOMID = A.ROOMID),'AM HH24:MI') WHEN 1 THEN '어제' ELSE TO_CHAR((SELECT MAX(REG_DATE) FROM CHAT B WHERE B.ROOMID = A.ROOMID),'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS LASTTIME, (SELECT B.CONTENTS FROM CHAT B WHERE B.REG_DATE=(SELECT MAX(REG_DATE) FROM CHAT WHERE ROOMID = B.ROOMID) AND A.ROOMID=B.ROOMID) AS LASTCONTENTS, (SELECT LISTAGG((SELECT USER_NICNAME FROM CHATUSER D WHERE D.USERID = C.USERID AND D.USERID != #{userid}),',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ROOMID) FROM USERROOM C WHERE C.ROOMID=A.ROOMID GROUP BY ROOMID) AS USERINROOM FROM ROOM A WHERE A.ROOMID = ANY(SELECT DISTINCT ROOMID from USERROOM where USERID=#{userid})) E WHERE 1=1 AND LASTTIME IS NOT NULL
AND USERINROOM LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
ORDER BY LASTTIME DESC

SELECT A.USERID as "userid", TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd AM hh24:mi:ss') AS "sendDate", (SELECT USER_NICNAME FROM CHATUSER B WHERE B.USERID = A.USERID) AS "user_nicname", A.ROOMID as "roomid", A.CONTENTS AS "contents", (SELECT MY_PROFILE_IMG_URL FROM CHATUSER WHERE USERID = A.USERID) AS "profileimg" FROM CHAT A WHERE ROOMID= #{roomid} ORDER BY REG_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT ( ROOMID, USERID, CONTENTS, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( ${roomid}, #{userid}, #{contents}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT E.CHK AS CHK FROM ( SELECT CASE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERROOM D WHERE D.ROOMID = C.ROOMID) WHEN 2 THEN C.ROOMID ELSE 0 END AS CHK FROM ( SELECT A.ROOMID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ROOMID FROM USERROOM WHERE USERID=#{userid}) A, (SELECT DISTINCT ROOMID FROM USERROOM WHERE USERID=#{frndid}) B WHERE A.ROOMID = ANY(B.ROOMID) ) C ) E WHERE E.CHK NOT IN(0)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM ( ROOMID, USERID, DEL_YN, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(ROOMID) FROM ROOM)+1, #{userid}, 'N', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT ROOMID FROM ( SELECT ROOMID FROM ROOM WHERE USERID = #{userid} ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERROOM ( USERID, ROOMID, DEL_YN, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{roomid}, 'N', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
INSERT INTO CHKREADMSG ( ROOMID, USERID, LASTREADDATE ) VALUES ( #{roomid}, #{userid}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT A.MY_PROFILE_IMG_URL AS PROFILE_IMG, A.USERID FROM CHATUSER A, (SELECT distinct userid FROM userroom where roomid = #{roomid}) B WHERE A.USERID = B.USERID
